title: Building Web Applications with Erlang.epub
description:
With this digital Early Release edition of Programming Web Services with Erlang, you get the entire book bundle in its earliest form the author's raw and unedited content so you can take advantage of this content long before the book's official release. You'll also receive updates when significant changes are made, as well as the final ebook version.

Built to support fault-tolerant telecom infrastructure, Erlang shines at reliability and scalability. Combining the Erlang language with the YAWS framework for supporting web services offers tremendous power for delivering massive volumes of data over the Web.
